text: Hi <@U26EWKYLC> as Remington mentioned, you’ll need to add module icons for each module submitted to the marketplace. We recently added the requirement (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/resources/what-are-the-module-requirements-for-the-marketplace#design-requirements>) due to the update to the page editor from a list view to a card view. If you’re having trouble, we have detailed instructions here <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/modules/configuration#adding-an-icon>
Im trying to install a module but it just spins and then says ' Connect app’ again :disappointed:
when i click on “connect app” and supply access to connect my accounts
